Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-REMOVE-DEVICE.request primitive.

See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.22, page 463.

Definition at line 77 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_RemoveDeviceReq_t::parentAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that is the parent of the child device that is requested to be removed.

Definition at line 89 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_RemoveDeviceReq_t::targetAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the target device that is requested to be removed. If a router device is requested to be removed, then the parentAddress shall be the same as the targetAddress.

Definition at line 93 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

APS_RemoveDeviceConf_t APS_RemoveDeviceReq_t::confirm

Confirm primitive as a parameter of the callback function

Definition at line 95 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

void(* APS_RemoveDeviceReq_t::APS_RemoveDeviceConf)(APS_RemoveDeviceConf_t *conf)

Callback function pointer as a handler of corresponding confirm primitive. Must not be set to NULL.

Definition at line 98 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.
